Title: Notice for Lost Experiment Sample
Text:
[WARNING: If You Find It, DO NOT Eat It!]
Yesterday around 6:30 AM on my way to the Institute, I accidentally dropped a sample. It's in a transparent bag and looks kind of like Midnight Wonder Cup Noodles.
IF YOU FIND IT, CONTACT ME IMMEDIATELY! REPEAT: DO NOT CONSUME!

[From "FoodAndResearchAreMyLife"]
Oh no… I already ate it. Thought it was cup noodles my labmate left me. Is it toxic?? Bio, mineral, synthetic neuro-??? Do I call medical or start drafting my will??

[From DoNotEatIt]
…It's not toxic. I spent over a month making that stuff, added a customized nutrient mix, and in previous animal tests it helped control weight and temporarily boosted physical metrics. But the synthesis yield was abysmal. That was the only cup… and I was planning to test it on myself.

[From "FoodAndResearchAreMyLife"]
Ah... I see. Sorry, I was starving after an all-nighter.


[From DoNotEatIt]
Then congratulations, you're now the test subject. Send me your weight and grip strength data every 72 hours.

[From "FoodAndResearchAreMyLife"]
Copy that.
